#include <iostream>
#include <stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t, c, n, p, j, sum=0;
    cin>>t;
    for(int i=0; i<t; i++)
    {
        cin>>n>>c;
        for(j=0;j<n; j++)
        {
            cin>>p;
            sum+=p;
        }
        (sum<=c)?(cout<<endl<<"Yes"):(cout<<endl<<"No");
        sum=0;

    }
    return 0;
}
